translation.en: Dad, my interview is about to start.
- What happened to the Wi- Fi? - Try by the window.
translation.es: - ¿Y el wifi? - Acércate a la ventana.

translation.en: No, he can't go over by the window. I've just set up all of this here.
translation.es: No puede sentarse en la ventana. Preparé todo esto aquí.

translation.en: Okay. We're back. Could someone tell Kayla not to blast music while I'm doing this?
translation.es: Bien. Volvimos. ¿Podrían decirle a Kayla que apague la música?

translation.en: Your interview's not for 15 minutes. Go tell her yourself.
translation.es: Tu entrevista es en 15 minutos. Díselo tú mismo.

translation.en: I gotta keep an eye on Mom. We're one step away from baby photos.
translation.es: Debo vigilar a mamá. Querrá poner fotos de bebé.

translation.en: Oh, good. How else would anyone know what sport I play?
translation.es: Genial. Sin eso, ¿cómo sabrían qué deporte practico?

translation.en: Kayla, turn the music down, please.
translation.es: Kayla, baja el volumen, por favor.

translation.en: One day you're gonna be a second late, and I'm gonna worry.
translation.es: Un día, te retrasarás un segundo y voy a preocuparme.

translation.en: Anyway, I'm on Canadian time. So technically, I'm five hours early.
translation.es: Y estoy en horario canadiense. Técnicamente, llegué cinco horas antes.

translation.en: Ugh, even time is better back home.
translation.es: Hasta la hora es mejor en casa.

translation.en: You're scoring week in, week out.
Scouts flocking to your games, home and away,
translation.es: Todos los cazatalentos van a tus partidos, de local y de visitante,

translation.en: and then you move to England!
moves to England and sets up a center of excellence
translation.es: se muda a Inglaterra y abre un centro de excelencia

translation.en: that has produced no less than six international superstars.
translation.es: del que han surgido al menos seis superestrellas internacionales.

translation.en: Come on. She had no curfew back home.
All of this is new for her.
She has a curfew because this is new for her.
translation.es: Y es por eso que tiene hora límite.

translation.en: - Maybe she's with friends. - She doesn't have any friends yet.
translation.es: - Quizá esté con amigos. - Aún no tiene.

translation.en: All right, look. One problem at a time?
translation.es: Bien, escucha: un problema a la vez.

translation.en: Hammarström used to play with your dad, right?
I think it'd be more accurate to say that my dad played with Hammarström.
translation.es: Para ser más precisos, mi papá jugó con Hammarström.

translation.en: Luke MacBentley did not smash any NHL records.
translation.es: Luke MacBentley no batió ningún récord en la NHL.

translation.en: So we got some more questions coming in here from Sean in Alberta.
translation.es: Tenemos algunas preguntas de Sean, desde Alberta.

translation.en: Back home, you are known as the Mac- gician.
Do your new teammates have any nicknames for you yet?
If she's not home by ten, I'm gonna call the police.
translation.es: A las diez, llamaré a la policía.

translation.en: It's not so obviously cool as Mac- gician, but--
translation.es: No es tan genial como Mac-gico, pero…

translation.en: - No, no. I'm… I'm still the-- -
On a scale from one to grounded, where do you think you're at?
translation.es: Del uno al diez, ¿qué tan castigada crees que estás?

translation.en: Well, they don't know I snuck into the rink, which is good.
translation.es: No saben que fui a patinar, lo cual es bueno.

translation.en: And I've still got the Mac uprooted me and dragged me to England card, so…
translation.es: Y aún tengo la excusa Mac me arrastró a Inglaterra, así que…

translation.en: We need to nail those jumps if we're gonna be ready for Ice Burn.
translation.es: Debemos pulir los saltos para el torneo.

translation.en: how are we gonna do Ice Burn?
Just… I love these long- distance skates.
They're… they're great. They're really fun. But I mean, we're not…
translation.es: Es genial. Me divierto mucho, pero no somos…

translation.en: I'm still your best friend, that's not gonna change, but it's just…
translation.es: Soy tu mejor amigo y eso no cambiará, pero…

translation.en: I don't know if this is such a good idea. I--
translation.es: No sé si sea buena idea, yo…

translation.en: I just thought it wouldn't matter.
I know that sounds crazy. I just thought
you can put us in Canada and England
translation.es: Creí que podríamos ir a Canadá, Inglaterra,

translation.en: or the moon and Timbuktu, and we'd find a way.
translation.es: Creí que podríamos ir a Canadá, Inglaterra, la Luna o Tombuctú, y siempre encontraríamos un modo.

translation.en: I mean, they found ice on the moon, right?
translation.es: Digo, hay hielo en la Luna, ¿no?

translation.en: I'm getting princess emojis from people I haven't spoken to
translation.es: Recibo emojis de princesa de gente con la que no hablo desde la primaria.
de gente con la que no hablo desde la primaria.

translation.en: This is your fault. You ruined my interview for Iceblast, Kayla.
translation.es: Es tu culpa. Arruinaste mi entrevista, Kayla.

translation.en: - You are gonna find a new partner, Kayla. -
Because you, you could skate with anyone.
Wh… Why is Mac getting princess emojis?
translation.es: ¿Por qué Mac recibe emojis de princesa?

translation.en: and he told 900 people that his nickname was Drama Queen.
translation.es: Dijo ante 900 personas que su apodo era Dramática.

translation.en: Mama, if I leave the ice earlier, I can change at the rink.
translation.es: Mamá, si saliera antes, podría cambiarme en la pista.

translation.en: Ava, you need to work on your priorities.
translation.es: Ava, debes trabajar en tus prioridades.

translation.en: Mama, I need to change at the rink. Mama, I should be at school.
translation.es: Debo cambiarme en la pista. Debería estar en la escuela.

translation.en: Was. I haven't seen her since your dad stopped playing.
translation.es: Era. No la veo desde que tu papá dejó de jugar.
Ese es el último prodigio de tu padre.

translation.en: All these hockey stars he flies in,
and he can't see the skating sensation right in front of him.
translation.es: no ve a la maravilla del patinaje que tiene delante de sus narices.

translation.en: But you're gonna show him, aren't you, Ava?
So, this is an open invitational.
Look, I know it's a bit soon,
but I just thought if you could find a partner,
translation.es: pero pensé que, si encuentras una pareja,

translation.en: obviously, you qualify for the UK team through me.
translation.es: clasificarás al equipo británico a través de mí.

translation.en: This could be a chance for medals, sweetheart.
translation.es: Es una oportunidad para ganar medallas.

translation.en: You know, your first step on that path.
translation.es: Tu primer paso hacia esa meta.

translation.en: Mac's only been here two weeks. He's still trying to impress.
translation.es: Mac llegó hace solo dos semanas. Quiere impresionar.

translation.en: Look, there's trying to impress, and then there's just showing off.
translation.es: Una cosa es impresionar y otra, alardear.

translation.en: Four players surrounding him, and he still did not pass.
translation.es: Cuatro jugadores lo rodeaban, y no la pasó.

translation.en: And he got around them and scored.
translation.es: Los eludió a todos y anotó.
No se trata de eso, Bear.

translation.en: Your brother isn't the one always shouting for a puck that never comes, is he?
translation.es: Tu hermano no es el que se cansa de pedir pases que nunca llegan, ¿no?

translation.en: Just… Just one teeny, little prank.
- Do you want some ketchup? - Sure.
Easy, man. You'll put a hole in the net. And my brother.
translation.es: Tranquilo. Vas a agujerear la red. Y a mi hermano.

translation.en: Training's done. Let's get a drink.
translation.es: Terminó la práctica. Vamos a tomar algo.

translation.en: - How many was that? - I've lost count.
If I'm at my best, then you guys are at yours, okay? So…
translation.es: Si juego a mi mejor nivel, ustedes también, así que…

translation.en: No need to be a drama queen.
- Do you ever skate? - No, I just work here.
You sure, or just pretend to for free food?
Mum runs the cafe. She likes to keep an eye on me.
translation.es: Mi mamá administra la cafetería. Le gusta vigilarme.

translation.en: I can't answer that, Sky, because I'm not eavesdropping.
translation.es: No lo sé, Sky, no estoy escuchando a escondidas.

translation.en: - Are you some kind of master criminal? - Something like that.
translation.es: ¿Acaso eres un genio criminal? Algo así.
Soy Sky. ¿Eres el hermano de Kayla?

translation.en: Mac. Yeah, yeah. I won the hockey scholarship.
translation.es: Mac. Sí. Gané la beca de hockey.

translation.en: I don't know if you realized I was the one banging in all the goals.
translation.es: No sé si lo notaste, fui yo quien metió todos los goles.

translation.en: - Are goals important in hockey? - Pretty important.
You know, I, uh, got a nice smile, so…
gotta make sure I keep all my teeth.
translation.es: así que debo proteger mis dientes.

translation.en: Oh, just 'cause I thought it would have to be
translation.es: Creí que necesitarías un casco especial

translation.en: Besides, look, I gotta go get changed,
translation.es: En fin, tengo que ir a cambiarme,

translation.en: I'll try not to let my massive ego hit the door on the way out.
translation.es: Intentaré que mi enorme ego no golpee la puerta al salir.

translation.en: Oh, I feel bad. It's like being mean to a puppy.
translation.es: Me siento mal. Es como maltratar a un cachorrito.

translation.en: The only thing Mac and a puppy have in common is needing to be trained.
translation.es: Su única semejanza con un cachorro es que ambos necesitan adiestramiento.

translation.en: They might look cute, but give 'em an inch,
translation.es: Son lindos, pero si te descuidas,

translation.en: and they'll drag your family to a continent where you can't skate.
translation.es: te arrastrarán a un lugar donde no podrás patinar.

translation.en: If only we had a rink.
- I was in a pair. - Ah.
- Can you find a partner here? - You sound like my mom.
translation.es: - Consigue una aquí. - Suenas como mi mamá.

translation.en: Just, it's never been about that.
- What's it about? - I don't know.
translation.es: ¿De qué se trata? No lo sé.

translation.en: Just skating so in sync that you're, like, connected or something.
translation.es: De patinar en una sincronía tal que sientes una conexión o algo así.

translation.en: I don't know. It's like speaking a new language.
translation.es: No lo sé. Es como hablar un idioma nuevo.

translation.en: Sounds very special. I guess that doesn't come along every day.
translation.es: Parece algo especial. Supongo que eso no se ve a diario.

translation.en: - - Pick up, pick up, pick up, pick up.
You can do a double axel?
Sweetheart, I can hear you thinking from here.
translation.es: Cariño, te oigo pensar desde aquí.

translation.en: And make sure you bring your skates to the rink today.
translation.es: Y no olvides llevar tus patines hoy.

translation.en: We sort of maybe asked someone to audition to be your new partner.
translation.es: Le pedimos a alguien que haga una prueba para ser tu pareja.

translation.en: He is great. He's called Archie. He's 15, and trust me.
translation.es: Es genial. Se llama Archie. Tiene 15 años y, créeme, es fabuloso.
Tiene 15 años y, créeme, es fabuloso.

translation.en: - This is terrible. - He's, like, half her height.
translation.es: - Esto es terrible. - Él le llega a la cintura.

translation.en: Well, that is an exaggeration. Maybe three quarters.
translation.es: Estás exagerando. Quizá le llegue a los hombros.

translation.en: Ah, I've been to America before.
So, um, you've been looking for a partner long?
translation.es: Y bien, ¿hace mucho que buscas una pareja?

translation.en: I… I would help you up, but this tends to be where I drop people.
translation.es: Te ayudaría, pero aquí es cuando suelo dejar caer a mis parejas.

translation.en: Can we please just be honest and acknowledge how bad that was?
translation.es: ¿Podemos ser honestos y aceptar lo terrible que fue?

translation.en: - Good. I'm so glad you said. - I'm so sorry, love. It's my fault.
translation.es: Lo siento mucho, amor. Es mi culpa.

translation.en: Yeah. I mean, I thought you were bringing him down, really.
translation.es: Sí. Pensé que lo ibas a derribar, lo juro.

translation.en: Well, Anton's back today, so it'd be good to stay and support Mac.
translation.es: Anton regresó hoy. Sería bueno quedarnos y apoyar a Mac.

translation.en: He watched you, right? So it'd be nice.
translation.es: Él te vio a ti, ¿verdad? Sería lo justo.

translation.en: Hammarström can cut me loose at any time. I gotta hit the ground running.
translation.es: Hammarström podría echarme. Debo empezar a entrenar.

translation.en: Can I get you a milkshake?
Are you okay? Have you got a fever? Headache?
You know what the doctor said.
You're not out of the woods yet. You have to be so careful.
translation.es: Aún no estás fuera de peligro. Debes cuidarte mucho.

translation.en: Okay, now I have a headache.
Okay, Hammers. Let's go! Go! Go!
Mac, let's show Anton exactly why you're here.
translation.es: Mac, muéstrale a Anton por qué estás aquí.

translation.en: I need a captain's performance from you today, all right? Captain's. Go.
translation.es: Necesito que juegues como un capitán hoy, ¿sí? Vamos.

translation.en: Tonight is the first time Hammarström has seen the new team.
translation.es: Esta noche, Hammarström conocerá al nuevo equipo.

translation.en: We're in this together. So I need you to play together.
translation.es: Estamos juntos en esto. Jueguen juntos.

translation.en: - Remember all your goals for the Cyclones? - Yes, coach.
translation.es: - ¿Recuerdas tus goles con los Ciclones? - Sí, entrenador.

translation.en: As far as I'm concerned, tonight is the first time you pulled on skates.
translation.es: En lo que a mí respecta, es la primera vez que te veo jugar.

translation.en: - You show me what you got. - Yes, coach.
translation.es: - Muéstrame lo que sabes. - Sí, entrenador.

translation.en: Come. I need a word with my new assistant coach.
translation.es: Ven. Necesito hablar con mi nuevo asistente.

translation.en: - Oh, hey, buddy. What's up? - Hi, Anton.
Sorry I wasn't here when you arrived.
I had a Legends tour in Russia, then a book launch in Sweden.
translation.es: Tuve una gira en Rusia y el lanzamiento de un libro en Suecia.

translation.en: - Still, great to be back on the ice again. - Yeah, nothing like it.
translation.es: Pero es genial volver al hielo. Sí, no hay nada igual.

translation.en: I need you in the stands. Yeah, I want training recorded.
translation.es: Te necesito en las gradas. Quiero grabar la práctica.

translation.en: So, Mac's been training hard, haven't you, Mac?
- Yeah. - This boy's a special player, huh?
I know talent when I see it.
translation.es: Tengo buen ojo para el talento.

translation.en: Uh, she's fine. She's just had a bit of a day.
translation.es: Está bien. Tuvo un día difícil.

translation.en: Now, that's a Kayla storm- off if I've ever seen one.
translation.es: La tormenta Kayla ataca de nuevo.

translation.en: That's typical. First training session with Hammarström,
translation.es: Típico. Es mi primera práctica con Hammarström,

translation.en: you gotta make it all about you? Can't you just let me have my thing?
translation.es: ¿por qué todo se trata de ti? ¿No puedes dejarme tener lo mío?

translation.en: You… Your thing? So it's not enough for you to steal my life in Canada.
translation.es: ¿Lo tuyo? ¿No te basta con robarme mi vida en Canadá?

translation.en: - Now you wanna take skating from me too? - Oh, my G--
translation.es: - ¿Ahora quieres quitarme el patinaje? - Dios mío…

translation.en: - Get over yourself, Kayla. - Me and Jacob had something.
translation.es: - Supéralo, Kayla. - Jacob y yo teníamos algo.

translation.en: No, you and Jacob had a hobby.
translation.es: No, Jacob y tú tenían un pasatiempo.

translation.en: I don't know if you've noticed, but I'm going for the literal NHL here.
translation.es: No sé si lo notaste, pero yo estoy a un paso de la NHL.

translation.en: If it was that important, Mom and Dad would've found a way for you to stay.
translation.es: Si fuera importante, mamá y papá habrían hecho que te quedaras.

translation.en: - Yeah, I'm fine. - You don't look fine.
You are good and you are pure The angel knockin' at my door
- We just need to make sure that she's-- - Kayla.

translation.es: No hay disciplina en esa familia.

translation.en: You can't be a success without discipline, without dedication.
translation.es: No se puede triunfar sin disciplina, sin dedicación.

translation.en: Silly girl. She's gonna get herself hurt.
translation.es: Niña tonta. Se va a lastimar.

translation.en: Pull a stunt like that again, and you're banned from my rink, okay?
translation.es: Si esto se repite, no patinarás más aquí, ¿entendido?

translation.en: Mac, get changed. We're going home. And you, Kayla. Come on. Let's go.
translation.es: Mac, cámbiate. Nos vamos a casa. Y tú, Kayla. Vámonos.

translation.en: What the hell were you thinking?

translation.es: La violencia jamás es la respuesta.

translation.en: - Um, have you seen hockey? - Don't be smart.
translation.es: - ¿Has jugado hockey? - No te hagas el listo.

translation.en: Never in anger, and never, ever against your sister.
translation.es: Nunca con rabia, y menos contra tu hermana.

translation.en: And as for you, we are so disappointed in you, Kayla.
translation.es: Y en cuanto a ti, estamos muy decepcionados, Kayla.

translation.en: That is not how we brought you up to behave.
translation.es: No es así como te educamos.

translation.en: - Humiliating your brother like that. - In front of his whole team.
translation.es: - Humillaste a tu hermano. - Frente a su equipo.

translation.en: It's not how we do things in our family.
translation.es: Nuestra familia no hace las cosas así.

translation.en: No, I know exactly how we do things in our family.
translation.es: No, sé bien cómo hace las cosas nuestra familia.

translation.en: We turn our whole world upside down, give up everything
translation.es: Damos un vuelco a nuestra vida y renunciamos a todo

translation.en: so one person can play a stupid sport.
translation.es: para que una sola persona pueda jugar un deporte estúpido.

translation.en: Right. Well, I better start making some dinner, then.
translation.es: Bueno, será mejor que empiece a preparar la cena.

translation.en: Dad was gonna make three- bean stew,
but after the day we've had, no need to inflict that on anyone.
translation.es: pero después de este día, ya sufrimos suficiente.

translation.en: It's not me you need to be saying sorry to, is it?
translation.es: No es a mí a quien le debes una disculpa.

translation.en: Today is all you need to be apologizing for, okay?
translation.es: Solo debes disculparte por lo de hoy, ¿sí?

translation.en: 'Cause everything else we decided as a family.
translation.es: Todo lo demás lo decidimos como familia.

translation.en: Oh, but not like in the Chinooks.
All that warm air coming in over the mountain.
translation.es: Todo ese aire caliente que entra por la montaña.

translation.en: English wind is just, uh, windy.
translation.es: El viento inglés es ventoso, nada más.

translation.en: I'm sorry you miss stuff too.

translation.es: Pero esto no es para siempre.

translation.en: And you know what I don't miss?
And your brother and your mom.
translation.es: Y a tu hermano y tu mamá.

translation.en: 'Cause Canada might be where we're from, but home, that's wherever we're together.
translation.es: Canadá es nuestra casa, pero nuestro hogar es dondequiera que estemos juntos.

translation.en: So, if I had a crazy dream, you'd make it work for me too?
translation.es: Si yo tuviera un sueño loco, ¿también me apoyarían?

translation.en: Well, maybe not for that, uh, that skater your mom found.
translation.es: A menos que sea con el patinador que tu mamá encontró.

translation.en: There's something you need to know.
Please, please. Just, you felt it too.
translation.es: Por favor. Tú también lo sentiste.

translation.en: That connection. I know you did.
I'm guessing that helmet's not for show.
translation.es: Supongo que ese casco tiene un motivo. Si es un secreto, no diré nada.

translation.en: So if it's a secret, I'll keep it, but please just tell me who you are.
translation.es: Supongo que ese casco tiene un motivo. Si es un secreto, no diré nada. Pero, por favor, dime quién eres.
